flawed_nl_solution:
His order came out to 7*200=$<<7*200=1400>>1400
So there was 1400-1000=$<<1400-1000=400>>400 that qualified for the discount
So his discount saved 400*0.1=$<<400*0.1=40>>40
So his purchase came out to 1400-40=$<<1400-40=1306>>1306
#### 1306

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1360, not 1306. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
